snippet: Will Bourne and Jessica Lustig said they were departing because they were told to make deep cuts in the 20-person staff.
abstract: Editors Will Bourne and Jessica Lustig announce their abrupt departure from The Village Voice, citing their unwillingness to comply with layoffs ordered by company executives; newspaper has undergone tumult and high rate of turnover as its owners have come to grips with declining revenue and increased competition.
lead_paragraph: Will Bourne and Jessica Lustig said they were departing because they were told to make deep cuts in the 20-person staff.

headline.seo: Top Editors Abruptly Leave Village Voice
headline.main: Top Editors Abruptly Leave Village Voice Over Staff Cuts
headline.print_headline: Top Editors Abruptly Leave Village Voice Over Staff Cuts
